page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JOANNE
page.content: On June 28th1985 I got up and dressed. I watched TV.AM.I had breakfast and collected my lunch.I arrived at school at 8.45am.Our class went by coach to Chatsworth House. At 10.45am.I arrived at Chatsworth House.I went to the farm and saw the animals.I visited the Adventure play- ground.Next I entered the house with it's marvellous paintings,tapestries and furniture.At 12.30pm.I had lunch. Next I saw the Emperor Fountain and the gardens. At 2.30pm.I arrived at Riber Castle.I saw lynxes,grey squirrels and exotic birds.I saw a vintage car museum.At 3.30pm.I left.At 5.30pm.I returned to school.I went home.I had my tea,watched television and went to bed at 10.00pm.
